definition[0]: spending by consumers on things that they want to buy rather than on things they need such as housing or food
example[0]: Jewelry companies, which depend on discretionary spending, are forecasting better times.
definition[1]: spending by a company or organization that can easily be increased or reduced, for example on advertising or developing new products
example[1]: Although the company is limiting discretionary spending, it is maintaining major projects that other companies might have tried to cancel.
